query:
-- Get project and user IDs first
SELECT p.id as projectId, p.name, p.totalQuotaHours, u.id as userId, u.name as userName 
FROM projects p
CROSS JOIN users u
WHERE p.name = 'NRP CSEM' AND u.name IN ('Vikram Bhatnagar', 'Celso Cattaneo');

-- Insert individual quotas: Vikram gets 25h, Celso gets 14h out of 39h total
INSERT INTO userProjectQuotas (userId, projectId, quotaHours) VALUES
((SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = 'Vikram Bhatnagar'), (SELECT id FROM projects WHERE name = 'NRP CSEM'), 25),
((SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = 'Celso Cattaneo'), (SELECT id FROM projects WHERE name = 'NRP CSEM'), 14);
